welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lima, a charming city known for its vibrant cultural scene, delicious culinary offerings, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Lima has to offer during your visit!

restaurants.name: Churrasquería Cristal
restaurants.description: Churrasquería Cristal is a brazilian restaurant located in Sta Rosa del Aguaray.
restaurants.address: Ruta III km. 325, Sta Rosa del Aguaray

restaurants.description: kangreburguer is a burger joint located in the city.

restaurants.description: Churrasqueria - Boi de Oro is a bbq joint located in the city.

restaurants.description: Espacio 1 is a cafeteria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Lomiteria "El Cruce"
restaurants.description: Lomiteria "El Cruce" is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allen County Airport is a modern and efficient facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Allen County Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
